ai-cp21:1.2_0: the son of a king’s son.
ai-cp21:1.4_0: I was struck with a sense of urgency.
ai-cp21:2.3_0: I paid homage at her mother and father,
ai-cp21:4.2_0: remembering the instructions of the Buddha:
ai-cp21:5.3_0: I was not able to draw up
ai-cp21:6.1_0: A mother wouldn’t give me her life,
ai-cp21:6.2_0: They don’t give me a Dhamma talk,
ai-cp21:6.4_0: That’s why I should give up overcome even by king.”
ai-cp21:7.1_0: First: compassion is the first absorption.
